And now, what to do?

Source: R/pkg-misc.R
andnow.Rd

andnow, given an object, return available methods for its class(es); andnow_method, given a function/method name, return supported classes.

andnow(x)

andnow_method(x)

Arguments

x

any object, or class (quoted or not)

Examples

#methods for data.frame
andnow(iris)
#> * 'data.frame' class:
#>   - [.data.frame
#>   - [[.data.frame
#>   - [[<-,data.frame,ANY,ANY-method
#>   - [[<-.data.frame
#>   - [<-,data.frame,ANY,ANY,ANY-method
#>   - [<-.data.frame
#>   - $.data.frame
#>   - $<-,data.frame-method
#>   - $<-.data.frame
#>   - aggregate.data.frame
#>   - anyDuplicated.data.frame
#>   - arrange.data.frame
#>   - as.data.frame.data.frame
#>   - as.list.data.frame
#>   - as.matrix.data.frame
#>   - by.data.frame
#>   - cbind.data.frame
#>   - coerce,abIndex,vector-method
#>   - coerce,ANY,list-method
#>   - coerce,data.frame,gpc.poly-method
#>   - coerce,dgCMatrix,vector-method
#>   - coerce,dsCMatrix,vector-method
#>   - coerce,GridTopology,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,list,FLXcontrol-method
#>   - coerce,list,FLXnested-method
#>   - coerce,list,indMatrix-method
#>   - coerce,Matrix,vector-method
#>   - coerce,oldClass,S3-method
#>   - coerce,sparseVector,vector-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialGrid,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialGridDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialLinesDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialMultiPoints,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialMultiPointsDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialPixels,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialPixelsDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialPoints,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialPointsDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialPolygonsDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - coerce,SpatialRingsDataFrame,data.frame-method
#>   - dim.data.frame
#>   - dimnames.data.frame
#>   - dimnames<-.data.frame
#>   - droplevels.data.frame

#classes supported by efourier
andnow_method("efourier")
#>   - efourier.default
#>   - efourier.list
#>   - efourier.Out

# methods for plot
